pages.text: As you explore, you will inevitably come across monster spawners. In this pack, you can pick them up using a Silk Touch pickaxe! And if you left your silky tool at home and just want to disable the spawner, provide it with a redstone signal e.g. a lever. Right-click on a mob spawner and it will drop its monster egg corresponding to what type of entity is inside.
Modify Mob Spawner stats such as count, speed and range. Example: make spawner active for a maximum of 128 blocks! Vanilla is 16
